sys_variable_value.value:
{"cards":[{"name":"Avacyn, Angel of Hope","manaCost":"{5}{W}{W}{W}","cmc":8.0,"colors":["W"],"colorIdentity":["W"],"type":"Legendary Creature — Angel","supertypes":["Legendary"],"types":["Creature"],"subtypes":["Angel"],"rarity":"Mythic","set":"AVR","setName":"Avacyn Restored","text":"Flying, vigilance, indestructible
Other permanents you control have indestructible.","flavor":"A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.","artist":"Jason Chan","number":"6","power":"8","toughness":"8","layout":"normal","multiverseid":"239961","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=239961&type=card","rulings":[{"date":"2020-08-07","text":"Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to a creature you control may become lethal if Avacyn leaves the battlefield during that turn."},{"date":"2020-08-07","text":"A planeswalker with indestructible still loses loyalty as it's dealt damage. It is put into its owner's graveyard if its loyalty becomes 0."}],"foreignNames":[{"name":"Avacyn, Engel der Hoffnung","text":"Fliegend, Wachsamkeit
Avacyn, Engel der Hoffnung und andere bleibende Karten, die du kontrollierst, sind unzerstörbar.","type":"Legendäre Kreatur — Engel","flavor":"Ein goldener Wirbel wand sich vom Höllenkerker gen Himmel. Unter einer donnernden Explosion zerbarst der silberne Monolith, und Avacyn erschien — endlich aus ihrem Gefängnis befreit.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=340526&type=card","language":"German","multiverseid":340526},{"name":"Avacyn, ángel de la esperanza","text":"Vuela, vigilancia.
Avacyn, ángel de la esperanza y los demás permanentes que controlas son indestructibles.","type":"Criatura legendaria — Ángel","flavor":"Una hélice dorada se proyectó hacia el cielo desde Helvault. Una explosión atronadora resquebrajó el monolito plateado y Avacyn surgió, libre al fin de su prisión.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=296010&type=card","language":"Spanish","multiverseid":296010},{"name":"Avacyn, ange de l'espoir","text":"Vol, vigilance
Avacyn, ange de l'espoir et les autres permanents que vous contrôlez sont indestructibles.","type":"Créature légendaire : ange","flavor":"Une volute dorée jaillit du Helgruft vers le ciel. Une formidable explosion pulvérisa le monolithe d'argent, libérant enfin Avacyn de sa prison.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295522&type=card","language":"French","multiverseid":295522},{"name":"Avacyn, Angelo della Speranza","text":"Volare, cautela
Avacyn, Angelo della Speranza e gli altri permanenti che controlli sono indistruttibili.","type":"Creatura Leggendaria — Angelo","flavor":"Una spirale dorata si librò verso il cielo dalla Tomba Infernale. Una fragorosa esplosione frantumò il monolito d'argento e Avacyn emerse, finalmente libera dalla sua prigione.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=296254&type=card","language":"Italian","multiverseid":296254},{"name":"希望の天使アヴァシン","text":"飛行、警戒
希望の天使アヴァシンとあなたがコントロールする他のパーマネントは破壊されない。","type":"伝説のクリーチャー — 天使","flavor":"黄金の光が獄庫から天空へとらせん状に伸びていった。 巨石のごとき銀塊が轟音とともに砕け散り、囚われのアヴァシンはついに解放された。","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=294245&type=card","language":"Japanese","multiverseid":294245},{"name":"희망의 천사 아바신","text":"비행, 경계
희망의 천사 아바신과 당신이 조종하는 다른 지속물들은 파괴될 수 없다.","type":"전설적 생물 — 천사","flavor":"금색 빛줄기가 나선을 그리며 헬볼트에서 하늘로 솟아올랐다. 우레와 같은 폭발과 함께 헬볼트가 파괴되었고, 마침내 감옥에서 풀려난 아바신이 힘차게 비상했다.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=294790&type=card","language":"Korean","multiverseid":294790},{"name":"Avacyn, Anjo da Esperança","text":"Voar, vigilância
Avacyn, Anjo da Esperança, e as outras permanentes que você controla são indestrutíveis.","type":"Criatura Lendária — Anjo","flavor":"Uma espiral dourada jorrou da Câmara Infernal rumo ao céu. Uma explosão retumbante estilhaçou o monólito prateado e Avacyn ressurgiu, finalmente libertada de sua prisão.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295278&type=card","language":"Portuguese (Brazil)","multiverseid":295278},{"name":"Авацина, Ангел Надежды","text":"Полет, Бдительность
Авацина, Ангел Надежды и другие перманенты под вашим контролем не могут быть уничтожены.","type":"Легендарное Существо — Ангел","flavor":"Золотой луч ударил в небо из Хелволта. Оглушительный взрыв расколол серебряный монолит, и Авацина восстала, освобожденная от своих оков.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295766&type=card","language":"Russian","multiverseid":295766},{"name":"希望天使艾维欣","text":"飞行，警戒
希望天使艾维欣与其他由你操控的永久物不会毁坏。","type":"传奇生物～天使","flavor":"金色螺旋自狱窖疾升入空。 巨大银体在惊雷爆炸中碎裂，艾维欣终于自牢狱中脱困。","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=294546&type=card","language":"Chinese Simplified","multiverseid":294546},{"name":"希望天使艾維欣","text":"飛行，警戒
希望天使艾維欣與其他由你操控的永久物不會毀壞。","type":"傳奇生物～天使","flavor":"金色螺旋自獄窖疾昇入空。 巨大銀體在驚雷爆炸中碎裂，艾維欣終於自牢獄中脫困。","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295034&type=card","language":"Chinese Traditional","multiverseid":295034}],"printings":["2XM","AVR","HA6","IMA","J17","PHEL","PRM","V15"],"originalText":"Flying, vigilance
Avacyn, Angel of Hope and other permanents you control are indestructible.","originalType":"Legendary Creature — Angel","legalities":[{"format":"Commander","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Duel","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Gladiator","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Historic","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Historicbrawl","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Legacy","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Modern","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Vintage","legality":"Legal"}],"id":"2ed7c882-83c3-5867-87bc-5a6c8e69db56"}]}

{"cards":[{"name":"Avacyn, Angel of Hope","manaCost":"{5}{W}{W}{W}","cmc":8.0,"colors":["W"],"colorIdentity":["W"],"type":"Legendary Creature — Angel","supertypes":["Legendary"],"types":["Creature"],"subtypes":["Angel"],"rarity":"Mythic","set":"AVR","setName":"Avacyn Restored","text":"Flying, vigilance, indestructible
Other permanents you control have indestructible.","flavor":"A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.","artist":"Jason Chan","number":"6","power":"8","toughness":"8","layout":"normal","multiverseid":"239961","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=239961&type=card","rulings":[{"date":"2020-08-07","text":"Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to a creature you control may become lethal if Avacyn leaves the battlefield during that turn."},{"date":"2020-08-07","text":"A planeswalker with indestructible still loses loyalty as it's dealt damage. It is put into its owner's graveyard if its loyalty becomes 0."}],"foreignNames":[{"name":"Avacyn, Engel der Hoffnung","text":"Fliegend, Wachsamkeit
Avacyn, Engel der Hoffnung und andere bleibende Karten, die du kontrollierst, sind unzerstörbar.","type":"Legendäre Kreatur — Engel","flavor":"Ein goldener Wirbel wand sich vom Höllenkerker gen Himmel. Unter einer donnernden Explosion zerbarst der silberne Monolith, und Avacyn erschien — endlich aus ihrem Gefängnis befreit.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=340526&type=card","language":"German","multiverseid":340526},{"name":"Avacyn, ángel de la esperanza","text":"Vuela, vigilancia.
Avacyn, ángel de la esperanza y los demás permanentes que controlas son indestructibles.","type":"Criatura legendaria — Ángel","flavor":"Una hélice dorada se proyectó hacia el cielo desde Helvault. Una explosión atronadora resquebrajó el monolito plateado y Avacyn surgió, libre al fin de su prisión.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=296010&type=card","language":"Spanish","multiverseid":296010},{"name":"Avacyn, ange de l'espoir","text":"Vol, vigilance
Avacyn, ange de l'espoir et les autres permanents que vous contrôlez sont indestructibles.","type":"Créature légendaire : ange","flavor":"Une volute dorée jaillit du Helgruft vers le ciel. Une formidable explosion pulvérisa le monolithe d'argent, libérant enfin Avacyn de sa prison.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295522&type=card","language":"French","multiverseid":295522},{"name":"Avacyn, Angelo della Speranza","text":"Volare, cautela
Avacyn, Angelo della Speranza e gli altri permanenti che controlli sono indistruttibili.","type":"Creatura Leggendaria — Angelo","flavor":"Una spirale dorata si librò verso il cielo dalla Tomba Infernale. Una fragorosa esplosione frantumò il monolito d'argento e Avacyn emerse, finalmente libera dalla sua prigione.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=296254&type=card","language":"Italian","multiverseid":296254},{"name":"希望の天使アヴァシン","text":"飛行、警戒
希望の天使アヴァシンとあなたがコントロールする他のパーマネントは破壊されない。","type":"伝説のクリーチャー — 天使","flavor":"黄金の光が獄庫から天空へとらせん状に伸びていった。 巨石のごとき銀塊が轟音とともに砕け散り、囚われのアヴァシンはついに解放された。","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=294245&type=card","language":"Japanese","multiverseid":294245},{"name":"희망의 천사 아바신","text":"비행, 경계
희망의 천사 아바신과 당신이 조종하는 다른 지속물들은 파괴될 수 없다.","type":"전설적 생물 — 천사","flavor":"금색 빛줄기가 나선을 그리며 헬볼트에서 하늘로 솟아올랐다. 우레와 같은 폭발과 함께 헬볼트가 파괴되었고, 마침내 감옥에서 풀려난 아바신이 힘차게 비상했다.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=294790&type=card","language":"Korean","multiverseid":294790},{"name":"Avacyn, Anjo da Esperança","text":"Voar, vigilância
Avacyn, Anjo da Esperança, e as outras permanentes que você controla são indestrutíveis.","type":"Criatura Lendária — Anjo","flavor":"Uma espiral dourada jorrou da Câmara Infernal rumo ao céu. Uma explosão retumbante estilhaçou o monólito prateado e Avacyn ressurgiu, finalmente libertada de sua prisão.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295278&type=card","language":"Portuguese (Brazil)","multiverseid":295278},{"name":"Авацина, Ангел Надежды","text":"Полет, Бдительность
Авацина, Ангел Надежды и другие перманенты под вашим контролем не могут быть уничтожены.","type":"Легендарное Существо — Ангел","flavor":"Золотой луч ударил в небо из Хелволта. Оглушительный взрыв расколол серебряный монолит, и Авацина восстала, освобожденная от своих оков.","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295766&type=card","language":"Russian","multiverseid":295766},{"name":"希望天使艾维欣","text":"飞行，警戒
希望天使艾维欣与其他由你操控的永久物不会毁坏。","type":"传奇生物～天使","flavor":"金色螺旋自狱窖疾升入空。 巨大银体在惊雷爆炸中碎裂，艾维欣终于自牢狱中脱困。","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=294546&type=card","language":"Chinese Simplified","multiverseid":294546},{"name":"希望天使艾維欣","text":"飛行，警戒
希望天使艾維欣與其他由你操控的永久物不會毀壞。","type":"傳奇生物～天使","flavor":"金色螺旋自獄窖疾昇入空。 巨大銀體在驚雷爆炸中碎裂，艾維欣終於自牢獄中脫困。","imageUrl":"http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=295034&type=card","language":"Chinese Traditional","multiverseid":295034}],"printings":["2XM","AVR","HA6","IMA","J17","PHEL","PRM","V15"],"originalText":"Flying, vigilance
Avacyn, Angel of Hope and other permanents you control are indestructible.","originalType":"Legendary Creature — Angel","legalities":[{"format":"Commander","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Duel","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Gladiator","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Historic","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Historicbrawl","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Legacy","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Modern","legality":"Legal"},{"format":"Vintage","legality":"Legal"}],"id":"2ed7c882-83c3-5867-87bc-5a6c8e69db56"}]}
